page.title: 04PEOPLE AND LEISURE
page.content: In the village of Elsfield there are 78 people, 44 males and 34 females.15 are under 16 years old, and 16 are retired.The area covers 524 hectares i.e. 0.15 persons per hectare. In the village of Woodeaton there are 72 people, 37 males and 35 females. 21 are under 16 years old, and 4 are of pensionable age.The area covers 319 hectares, i.e. 0.22 persons per hectare. The population is mainly Caucasian. Many of them are transient, because of connections with the University of Oxford. For most people their leisure pursuits are simple:_ gardening, walking, fishing, shooting or riding. To swim means going to Oxford or Kidlington. They also have to go there for theatres, cinemas and dances. Woodeaton has an annual fete.
